name: Circular Layout
description: Arrange selected footprints in a circle.
description_full: This plugin allows you to arrange selected footprints in a circular pattern on the PCB. After selecting two or more footprints, run the plugin from the Tools menu. A dialog will prompt you to enter the desired diameter for the circle. The footprints will then be evenly spaced around the circumference of a circle centered at the average position of the originally selected footprints.
